g.text: asks to update a formative exam
asks if user wants to view the exam
requests new header, grading feedback and feedback type
enters new header, grading feedback and feedback type
it would show the section description
it would allow the user to select to change either the section description, individual questions, all questions or even the type of questions
[user wants to update the section description]
it would show the questions relative to the selected section
index represents the position of the question in the list of questions
[user wants to update all questions from a section]
